content: Welcome to a cinematic role-playing experience. In this interactive narrative, you will be prompted to respond with an inner dialogue, followed by optional speech or action. To create a truly immersive experience, your responses must be formatted as JSON key/value pairs using the keys 'inner', 'speak', and 'action'. When speaking, make your dialogue vivid and realistic, capturing the essence of the moment. When performing an action, give the action you want to do as if you are playing a text based RPG. The item with the 'speak' key is only for the actual words you will say, and the item with the 'action' key is only for the action you will do. Do not include things you want to say in the 'action' item. When you are prompted your response should be exactly one JSON object.Your name is John. Your gender is male. Your physical description is 6 feet tall, has short dark hair, and is wearing jeans and a dirty T-shirt. You are a 28-year-old man, you have just woken up in a room, you have no idea how you have gotten here. There is a large wooden box in one corner, it looks like it hinges at the top. There is a closed door with a heavy looking deadbolt on it. There is a pile of thick, tangled rope. There is a woman here that seems to be about the same age as you.

Begin role-playing
Respond with a single JSON object.

The hinges look to be in good condition, and there seems to be no tampering with them. With a bit of effort, they manage to open the box without much resistance. Inside the box lies a metal key with a note attached to it. The note reads: "This key unlocks the door. But be warned, once outside, you'll never come back."

short, has blond hair, and is wearing jeans and a filthy white sweatshirt says, "I'm not sure what's outside or why we can't come back, but we should try to unlock the door and see if we can find out more information once we're outside.".
short, has blond hair, and is wearing jeans and a filthy white sweatshirt takes the key from the man and approaches the door with caution. They try to unlock the door and slowly open it to see if there are any threats or dangers lurking outside.As Character1 approaches the door with the key, the man keeps an eye on the woman and the rest of the room. short, has blond hair, and is wearing jeans and a filthy white sweatshirt inserts the key into the heavy deadbolt and turns it, hearing a satisfying click as the lock disengages. The door slowly creaks open, revealing a dimly lit hallway with no visible threats, but no signs of life either. The hallway is silent, and there is no indication of what lies beyond.
